name: Haniwa - Task Sharing and Reward Provision App for Families
description: Haniwa is an application designed to enhance motivation and manage tasks for regular and surprisingly labor-intensive household chores. Users can collect in-app points called Stars by completing tasks, which can then be exchanged for allowances or small luxuries. In addition to household chores, the application can be used for general tasks such as children's studies and errands.
